plants.name: Tuftroot
plants.about: Is a tropical species that grows fast and easy to take care of.
plants.water_tips: keep the earth always humid. irrigate two times a week.

plants.name: Zanzibar Gem
plants.about: Stays beautiful and green the whole year
plants.water_tips: Use pots with roles and stones at the bottom. irrigate 1 time a day.

plants.name: Peperomia
plants.water_tips: In the hotter days spray water on leaves. irrigate 3 times a week.

plants.name: Philodendron
plants.about: Medium size. Very easy to cultivate
plants.water_tips: keep the earth always humid. Irrigate 2 times a week.

plants.name: Snake plant
plants.about: They require very little water and sun, making them perfect for dark rooms and apartments.
plants.water_tips: Irrigate around the soil. Irrigate 1 time a day.

plants.name: Yucca
plants.about: They tolerate a range of conditions, but are best grown in full sun.

plants.name: Fruit tree
plants.about: Keep near windows, they need a little bit of sun.
plants.water_tips: Irrigate around the soil. Irrigate 3 times a week.

plants.name: Orchids
plants.about: Low-maintenance and doesn't need much space

plants.name: Viola
plants.about: Most species are found in the temperate Northern Hemisphere; however, some are also found in widely divergent areas such as Hawaii, Australasia, and the Andes.
plants.water_tips: Irrigate only the soil 2 times a week.

plants.name: hydrangea
plants.about: It is widely cultivated in many parts of the world in many climates.
plants.water_tips: keep the earth always humid. Irrigate 1 time a day.
